links.name: Cable Masters
links.description: Provides solutions with which installations in industry, utility and infrastructure can be realized as quickly, safely and efficiently as possible. Cablemaster expertise and dedication go-to partner for safe and reliable installations.

links.name: Nobeach
links.description: Nobeach is a Dutch travel agency website that specializes in beach-free vacations. They offer alternative vacation options that do not involve spending time at the beach

links.name: Geefinzicht
links.description: This platform helps individuals connect with experts who can provide assistance with various health and wellness issues. The website features a diverse group of experts, including therapists, coaches, and healers, who offer guidance and support for a range of topics, from mental health to personal growth.

links.name: Kentekencheck Search
links.description: This is vehicle registration check service for the Netherlands. The service allows users to search for information about a specific vehicle by its registration number (kenteken nummer in Dutch).

links.name: Wazi
links.description: The webpage promotes an anonymous digital therapy service that allows users to talk to a certified Kenyan therapist over the phone or through video/audio calls.

links.name: Sportways
links.description: SportWays offers a range of hockey camps for players of all ages and skill levels.

links.name: Quirkycoders
links.description: The project aims to help developers find new career opportunities by providing a platform to search for tech jobs.

links.name: Our Giving Board
links.description: The platform enables users to contribute funds in an help each other in turns
